message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. Given its value to you, we believe it would be fair to offer it to you for $14000. We understand this might be a significant investment, but we are confident it will provide substantial returns for you. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to consider a price of $13000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer based on our understanding of your budget constraints. We are now proposing a price of $13500 for the product. This still represents a premium over market value, but we hope it strikes a balance between our valuation of the product and your financial considerations. We look forward to your feedback.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. Considering my budget, I am prepared to offer $13000 for the product. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
